website_summaries.verdict: A quality, made-to-last set of cymbals that blend not only with gospel music but also work with country, metal, punk, and rock.
pros: Great sound with most musical styles
Hi-hat delivers a nice, crisp tone with a ring that fades out well
Lighter in weight than other cymbals
Can be transported easily in provided case
cons: May not be the right cymbals for jazz or blues, which require a deeper sound

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Game changer. Along with Remo Silent Stroke heads on our kit, the L80s make it possible to jam at conversation level. They sound beautiful. If you want to play your kit at 11pm without disturbing the neighbors - heck, without them even having any remote awareness that you are doing so - do yourself a big favor that you will never regret, and buy a set of L80s, along with a set of Silent Strokes. My band rehearses without a PA now. No need to rent a rehearsal space. Utterly tolerable volume levels. I tell anyone who will listen: the greatest thing to happen in music since The Beatles. Seriously. Conversation level. This has changed everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cymbals at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are great cymbals... They sound very professional, look amazing. For a giging drummer what more do you need? They arent A customs but who cares? You can buy 3 sets of these for the price of 1 set of A customs... If you play A lot these are a great option don't let the price snobs convince u otherwise...
customer_reviews.author: soundblasterjm

customer_reviews.title: Great set of cymbals
customer_reviews.text: Great cymbals. Only grip is that the hi-hat has to be setup a little tighter than I had with other cymbals for a good "chick" sound. The bells sound great. Have used them for different types of music including blues, funk, rock, big band swing. Also, I've had no physical issues with any of the cymbals.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and deal!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The cymbals speak for themselves. The bag is a backpack style and of very good quality. HIGHLY recommend this bundle!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Daley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: True quality! Can't say enough about these Zildjian A cymbals. Steve Smith was right when he said there's nothing that compares to the Zildian A or K series. Wow!!!
customer_reviews.author: hrockster

customer_reviews.title: an amazing kit my only problem is they don't offer a ...
customer_reviews.text: an amazing kit my only problem is they don't offer a 20" kick or a 2x 14" with it. i had to order them extra. that being said 2000% worth it, they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great cymbals
customer_reviews.text: For me, this bundle is nearly perfect. The A 21" sweet ride is one of the best rides out there, and also the 14" Hi Hat. The 16" Crash is not as good as a K but the 18" has a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Fermin R.

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, needs some tweaking
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ride and hi-hats. Crash left something to be desired. A 14" fast crash is what's in this pack, but maybe a 15" would be a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Pete M

customer_reviews.title: I recomend it
customer_reviews.text: We use it for a punk rock band and it has been great
customer_reviews.author: JU4N35

customer_reviews.title: cymbal gig bag was not the one advertized in the photos
customer_reviews.text: cymbals are as advertised however cymbal gig bag received was inferior to the one pictured and promised with purchase
customer_reviews.author: ronnie buckland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, and the bag is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Renato

customer_reviews.title: Great cymbals. Will have for lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Great cymbals. Will have for lifetime. Traditional dark K sound and wonderful ping on ride and great wash on crashes. Hats are crisp and heavy closed with nice tight chick on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where's the Gig Bag??
customer_reviews.text: Cymbals sound great and were untouched....BUT Factory seal was broken and the gig bag was not in the box. If I would have received everything I purchased I would have gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rovergirl

customer_reviews.title: Love these cymbals
customer_reviews.text: These cymbals are a blast, they sound great and are very universal for different genres. I play a lot of different styles such as rock, metal, worship, funk, punk and pop. So these cymbals work really well for that, they have a nice bright sound and they're lighter weight so they're ring doesn't sound awful but rather fades out nicely. However if you like jazz, blues or something requiring more of a deep and darker tone these cymbals are not meant for that. Overall awesome cymbals at a reasonable price, and the bag work great and is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: seller was awesome, very amazing! now when I look for music products, I check to see if they specifically have it first
customer_reviews.author: sam therebel

customer_reviews.title: Great combo
customer_reviews.text: Excellent combo of cymbals to supplement your starter or intermediate performance drum set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ziljian I Expression Pack 2 Cymbal Bundle with Gig Bag and Austin Bazaar Polishing Cloth
product_meta.description:
Size:I Expression Pack 2Adding value to your purchase, Austin Bazaar bundles your instrument with necessary accessories. Everything you need to start playing immediately comes in one box. Save yourself the hassle and save some money while you're at it. A stand is included so you don't need to purchase one separately. A gig bag is included so you can keep your instrument safely packed away when you're on the go. An Austin Bazaar polishing cloth is included so you can keep your new instrument in mint condition.

Express yourself with this great add-on effects pack, featuring an 18" crash and a 17" trash crash for quick, bright and trashy accents.

Cymbals included:
17" Trash Crash
18" Crash

Taking its name from Ilham, the Turkish word for inspiration, the I Family is a collection of expressive sounds designed to bring your playing to the next level. Broaden your sonic horizons from the fundamentals, and let your individual voice shine with this family of cymbals that feature modern weights and sizes, hammering, and extensive lathing. Explore and go further with I, and with the entire universe of Zildjian.

Cymbals included:
17" Trash Crash
18" Crash
feature_bullets: New cymbal packs for greater creative expansion
Bundle includes Cymbal Set, Gig Bag, and Austin Bazaar Polishing Cloth
